item.title: About
item.description: I’m a DevOps Engineer with over 7 years of experience in designing and implementing solutions across diverse tech stacks. My journey spans various industries where I’ve worked on building and maintaining scalable, efficient, and secure infrastructures. My expertise covers everything from automating complex deployments, managing cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure), and orchestrating containers (Docker, Kubernetes), to configuring CI/CD pipelines with tools like Jenkins and GitHub Actions. I’m passionate about optimizing workflows, ensuring high availability, and helping teams ship faster while improving reliability.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can reach out to me via email at mkumar.devlife@gmail.com for inquiries, collaborations, or just to chat about DevOps and tech. Follow me on Linkedin @msjaison for more updates and insights.

item.title: Projects
item.description: DevOps Automation Framework A custom automation framework that streamlines CI/CD processes using Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes. This project involved setting up automated testing, container orchestration, and scalable deployments across multiple environments. Cloud Infrastructure Setup (AWS) Designed and implemented a highly available and secure AWS cloud infrastructure using Terraform and Ansible. The project included provisioning EC2 instances, configuring VPCs, setting up auto-scaling, and load balancing for a microservices-based architecture. Monitoring and Logging System
